name: Creatures Rainbows Fury
description:
ALL the ancient protector has awakened and people are scrambling to obtain it's power. 

Collect Creatures and gain points to either go for a high score or to level up to beat a boss or ALL itself. 

Defeating Creatures will  gain you levels while taming them gives you points.

 Bosses can be challenged any time and will grant you elements and roll multipliers for Creature catching and battles. 

Trading  will grant you another players Creature as long as you have a code.
